name: Amber Guerrero
description: Amber is a Senior Manager of Product Support at Wealthfront and a licensed financial advisor holding Series 24, Series 65, Series 63, and Series 7 licenses from FINRA. Prior to joining Wealthfront, she worked at Scottrade.
